Instruction:
Preheat the slow cooker;

Combine apple juice, brown sugar, and mustard; mix well. Stir in the spice packets. Place briskets into the apple juice mixture; add potatoes, cabbage, onions, and carrots. Press the vegetables into the liquid.

Mix apple juice, brown sugar, and mustard in a large slow cooker until sugar dissolves. Add spice packets, brisket, potatoes, cabbage, onions, and carrots. Cook on High for 4 to 5 hours or on Low for 8 to 10 hours until corned beef is tender. Slice beef thinly across the grain and serve with vegetables.
